http.html:
By using this site you agree to our use of cookies as set out in our cookie notice which can be read here

I agree

LHC

Trusted procurement for better buildings and homes

MYLHC LOGIN
  • News
  • About us
  • Our Clients
  • Our Suppliers
  • Frameworks
  • Events

  • TRUSTED FOR OUR TECHNICAL INSIGHTS

    Detailed product knowledge shapes our
    procurement frameworks guaranteeing
    technically informed purchasing by our clients

  • Trusted for our Board Intelligence

    Join our Board as a Constituent Member to influence the strategic direction of LHC

    Join here

  • SCOTTISH PROCUREMENT ALLIANCE

    SPA delivers procurement excellence for Scottish public sector organisations

    More info

  • WELSH PROCUREMENT ALLIANCE

    Launched in April 2017

    Register your interest today


CLIENTS

DISCOVER THE BENEFITS OF OUR PROCUREMENT SERVICE

Detailed product and sustainability expertise combined with local understanding gained on the ground.

FIND OUT MORE >

SUPPLIERS

REGISTER YOUR INTEREST IN OUR  NEW OPPORTUNITIES

Tender documents can be downloaded on Pro Contract, where tender bids must also be submitted.

GO TO PRO CONTRACT >

JOIN US

JOIN LHC FREE TODAY AND ENJOY AN ANNUAL REBATE

Join LHC as either a Constituent or Associate Member, both with fantastic benefits for Councillors and public sector organisations

BECOME A MEMBER >
LHC is a leading provider of free-to-use framework agreements used by local authorities, social landlords and other public sector bodies to procure works, products and services for the construction, refurbishment and maintenance of social housing and public buildings

Search LHC
